name: Radium
Relationship: Compare: ANACARDIUM (the ulceration produced by it is like RADIUM. It may appear elsewhere than on place of contact and appear late). Compare: X-RAY; RHUS; SEPIA; URANIUM; ARS.; PULSAT.; CAUSTIC. Antidotes: RHUS VEN.; TELLUR.

Head: Both eyes ache
Itching and dryness of nasal cavities, better in open air
Aching pain of right lower jaw
Violent trifacial neuralgia
Frontal headache
Head feels heavy
Vertigo, with pain in back of head, left when in bed
Severe pain over right eye, spreading back to occiput and to vertex, better in open air
Occipital and vertex pain, accompanying severe lumbar aching
Respiratory: Persistent cough with tickling in suprasternal fossa
Stomach: Nausea and sinking sensation, belching of gas
Urine: Increased elimination of solids, particularly of chlorides
Renal irritation, albuminuria, granular and hyaline casts
Mind: Apprehensive, depressed; fear of being alone in the dark; great desire to be with people
Back: Lumbar and sacral backache, pain appears to be in bone, continued motion relieves
Backache between shoulders and lumbar-sacral region, better after walking
Pain and lameness in cervical vertebrae, worse dropping head forward, better standing, or sitting erect
Fever: Internal chilliness followed by heat of the skin, associated with bowel movements and flatulence
Cold sensation internally, with chattering of teeth until noon
Female: Delayed and irregular menstruation and backache
Aching pains in abdomen over pubes when flow comes on
Right breast sore, relieved by hard rubbing
Skin: Itching all over body, burning of skin, as if afire
Erythema and dermatitis, with itching, burning, swelling and redness
Abdomen: Pain, violent cramps, rumbling, full of gas; pain over mcburney's point, and at location of sigmoid flexure
Extremities: Arthritis, aching pains, worse at night
Pain in toes, calves, hip-joint, popliteal spaces
Muscles of legs and hips sore
Legs, arms and neck feel hard and brittle, as though they would break on moving
Severe pain in all the limbs, joints, especially in knee and ankles, sharp pains in shoulders, arms, hands and fingers
Trophic changes in the finger nails
Mouth: Prickling sensation on end of tongue

details: An important addition to the Materia Medica, especially since the provings by Diffenbach have precisionized its use. Radium brom. of 1, 800, 000 radio-activity was employed. Found effective in the treatment of rheumatism and gout, in skin affections generally, acne rosacea, naevi, moles, ulcers and cancers. Lowered blood pressure. SEVERE ACHING PAINS ALL OVER, with restlessness, better moving about. Chronic rheumatic arthritis. Lateness in appearance of symptoms. Ulcers due to Radium burns, take a long time to heal. Marked increase in the polymorphonuclear neurophiles. Great weakness.
